Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the department of health and mental hygiene posting worker guidance for best practices for protecting workers from extreme weather

Items.MatterName: Department of health and mental hygiene posting worker guidance for best practices for protecting workers from extreme weather.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, to allow the occupancy of cellars in certain one- and two-family dwellings

Items.Title: Resolution condemning Alden Global Capital cuts and managerial hostility towards unionized Daily News staff and calling on the hedge fund to reach a contract deal with the newspaper’s union.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Condemning Alden Global Capital cuts and managerial hostility towards unionized Daily News staff and calling on the hedge fund to reach a contract deal with the newspaper’s union.
